title: valsy
author: valsy
content: Hello everyone, I am new to mining and would like to know what software is used by professionals or just people who already have some experience in this field.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: valsy on March 27, 2023, 05:25:35 PMHello everyone, I am new to mining and would like to know what software is used by professionals or just people who already have some experience in this field.buy an asic machinebitmainAvalonwhatsmineruse their O.E.M. software get good with it.Then ask about aftermarket software pros and cons.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Since you are a newbie I suggest start reading this First time/Small miner reference for getting started.Or you might talking about a software that use for managing miners? Then check awesome miner and minerstat official thread below - Awesomeminer- Minerstat
